---
title: "Data Downloads for 431"
---

To download data and code for 431, 

1. Visit the repository at https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-data.

2. To obtain all of the data and code in this repository in a single zip file, click on the green button reading Clone or download, and click on Download ZIP.

3. Or, to download a single file, follow the instructions based on your operating system and internet browser [that we've provided here](https://github.com/THOMASELOVE/431-data/blob/master/README.md#detailed-steps-for-downloading-individual-csv-or-rmd-files-from-github).
